Legacy: Symbol of the French Revolution's ideals
Causes: Criticism of the monarchy, financial crisis
Impact: Overthrow of the monarchy, establishment of the Republic

Definition: Period of large-scale violence during the French Revolution
Events: Targeted killings of the French upper classes, including the execution of Louis XVI
Legacy: Greater freedom and Equality in rights
Action: Deployment of the guerrilla-like sans-culottes in Paris
